thread.title: Indonesia man marries woman who rang him by mistake | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Indonesia man marries woman who rang him by mistake | Daily Mail Online

author: Kelly Mclaughlin For Mailonline
title: Indonesia man marries woman who rang him by mistake | Daily Mail Online
text: Man, 28, falls in love with the voice of a woman who rang him by mistake, tracks her down and discovers she is 82â€¦ but marries her anyway Sofian Loho Dandel, 28, married 82-year-old Martha Potu in Indonesia last week The wedding came a year Potu accidentally dialed the wrong number and Dandel picked up the phone The pair began speaking on the phone, and Dandel, a 28-year-old garage mechanic in Indonesia, fell in love with Potu's voice When they finally met in person, Dandel was shocked to discover that Potu was an 82-year-old widow, as she had never disclosed her age He had already expressed his love, however, and his feelings were unchanged
